title: iPhone 14 Pro Max - Like New
description: Selling my iPhone 14 Pro Max 256GB in Deep Purple. Used for 6 months, always with screen protector and case. Battery health 98%. Comes with original box and charger.

title: BMW 320d 2019 - Excellent Condition
description: BMW 320d with M Sport package. Full service history, leather interior, navigation, parking sensors. 85,000 km. Recently serviced with new brakes.

title: Modern 2-Bedroom Apartment
description: Spacious 75sqm apartment in the city center. Fully furnished with new appliances. South-facing balcony with great views. Available immediately.

title: MacBook Pro M2 14-inch
description: MacBook Pro 14 with M2 Pro chip, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD. Space Gray. Purchased 3 months ago. AppleCare+ until 2026. Perfect for developers and designers.

title: Vintage Leather Sofa Set
description: Beautiful 3-piece leather sofa set in cognac brown. Genuine Italian leather. Includes 3-seater, 2-seater, and armchair. Minor wear consistent with age.

title: PlayStation 5 + 2 Controllers
description: PS5 Disc Edition with 2 DualSense controllers. Includes FIFA 24 and Spider-Man 2. All cables and original box. Barely used, like new condition.

title: Mountain Bike - Trek Marlin 7
description: 2022 Trek Marlin 7 in excellent condition. Size M (17.5). Shimano Deore groupset, hydraulic disc brakes. Great for trails and commuting.

title: Samsung 65" 4K Smart TV
description: Samsung Crystal UHD 65-inch Smart TV. Model 2023. Perfect for movies and gaming. Wall mount included. No scratches or dead pixels.

title: Office Desk with Chair
description: Ergonomic home office setup. Adjustable standing desk (140x70cm) and Herman Miller Aeron chair. Perfect for working from home.

title: Canon EOS R6 Camera Kit
description: Canon EOS R6 with RF 24-105mm f/4L lens. Shutter count under 5000. Includes 2 batteries, charger, and camera bag. Professional grade equipment.

title: Toyota Corolla 2020 Hybrid
description: Toyota Corolla Hybrid with 45,000 km. Full Toyota service history. Great fuel economy - 4L/100km. Reverse camera, adaptive cruise control.

title: Kids Bedroom Furniture Set
description: Complete children's bedroom set. Includes bed (140x200), wardrobe, desk, and bookshelf. White with blue accents. Great condition.
